Dear Harry:
Anent your letter to Adkins on the Fact Sheet Service,
I vote to "stick to our last". If a series on radio
research is called for, let it be a separate series.
Frankly, I don't think there is enough being done in
radio to warrant the new series just now, and to add
radio to the present project will look like padding.
Sincerely,
Irving R. Merrill,
Director of Television Research
